A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a stand alone movie\, its pretty good.  Visually beautiful film.\nAs part of the saga\, it leaves a lot to be desired.  Takes a lot of the good feelings from TFA and just tosses them aside.  A lot of fans will take this movie as a middle finger to the fandom.  I wouldn't go quite that far\, but it pushes the limits of what fans will accept.  Nutshell\, Disney just \"Marvelised\" Star Wars\, and not in a good way.
